name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

description.en: Algorithms and programs. Representations of algorithms, flow-charts. Branching algorithms. Loops. Sub-algorithm. Refining algorithms for given text-based problems. Number systems. Bit, byte. Types. Program structure. Names. Variables. Operations. Expressions. Text output. Boolean expressions, comparing. Methods, description, return of value, invoke. Conditional statement. Loop statement. One-dimensional arrays. Array scan. Array return. Nested loops. String processing. Input and output. Data exchange with files. Screen graphics. Overview of different programming languages. Main phases of software development.
description.et: Programmi ja algoritmi mõiste. Algoritmi esitusviisid, plokkskeemid. Hargnev algoritm. Tsükkel. Alamalgoritm. Tekstina püstitatud ülesande algoritmi koostamine. Positsioonilised arvusüsteemid. Bitt, bait. Tüübid. Programmi struktuur. Nimed. Muutujad. Tehted. Avaldised. Teksti väljastamine. Loogilised avaldised, võrdlemised. Meetodid, kirjeldamine, väärtuse tagastamine, rakendamine. Tingimusdirektiiv. Tsüklidirektiiv. Üld-, eelkontrolliga ja järelkontrolliga tsüklid. Järjendid (arvumassiivid). Järjendi läbivaatamine. Järjendit tagastavad meetodid. Kahekordne tsükkel. Sõnetöötlus. Programmi sisend ja väljund. Andmevahetus failidega. Ekraanigraafika. Ülevaade erinevatest programmeerimiskeeltest. Tarkvara arendamise etapid.

objectives.en: To improve basic knowledge about developing, testing and debugging computer programs. To improve the primary programming skills and elements of imperative programming.
objectives.et: Üliõpilane süvendab algteadmisi programmide koostamisest, testimisest ja silumisest. Üliõpilane täiendab esmast programmeerimisoskust.

learning_outcomes.en: After passing this course the student
- can use fundamental programming constructions: variables, expressions, assignments, conditionals, iterations, procedures, recursion, regular expression, simple input/output;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab kasutada põhilisi programmeerimiskonstruktsioone: muutuja, avaldis, omistuslause, tingimuslause, tsükkel, alamprogramm, rekursioon, regulaaravaldis, andmevahetus kasutaja ja failidega;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows basic datatypes and -structures (numeric types, booleans, strings, lists) and can use corresponding standard operations;
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb põhilisi andmetüüpe ja -struktuure (täis- ja ujukomarvud, tõeväärtused, sõned, järjendid) ning oskab kasutada vastavaid standardoperatsioone;

learning_outcomes.en: - can analyze and explain the behavior of simple programs, and modify and expand them;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab analüüsida ja üksikasjalikult selgitada programmi töö käiku ning programmi modifitseerida ja laiendada;

learning_outcomes.en: - can design algorithms for solving simple problems, and implement, test and debug the corresponding program.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab luua lihtsamale ülesandele vastava algoritmi, koostada ja korrektselt vormistada lahendusprogrammi ning seda siluda ja testida.

independent_work.et: Students have to watch video lecture and solve some exercises before the practical session. There will be a test after every video lecture (which has to be done before the practical session). During the course students will also do a project.

description.et: Explanation of homework solutions and percentage of correct answers in tests
Percentage of correct answers and correctness of the program
Correctness of the program, solution explanation

grade_preconditions.et: There is no minimum amount of points required for the exam.

grade_evaluation.et: Homeworks will be given after each practical session and should be submitted before the next practical session. The final score will be made up of the sum of the points obtained in homeworks, project and exam.

debt_elimination.et: Late homework submissions (up to 7 days late) can be accepted, but a penalty will be applied.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.recommended_materials: Charles Severance's course material (Python for Informatics): https://www.py4e.com/
